channel.title: 317 PI client Need Help Please
channel.description: okay so, me and my friend are making a new 317 pi server. it works we have it online and now i am begging to code it on my computer. the problem however is i can only code it over at his house for some reason. when i come to my house i cant log on it says error connecting to server. and yes i do change the ip to my ip. i do however have the 2nd ip in the client.java as 127.0.0.1 because i do not have any desire to have it online right now. if anyone knows if im forgetting to change something in the client or if i need to change something in the source to get this to work i would greatly appreciate. thanks

item.title: 317 PI client Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

You set the client’s IP to the HOSTS (No-)IP address, with correct ports open. And then, compile and try connecting.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 PI client Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @mike_xx mike xx
item.description:
@mike_xx wrote:

okay so, me and my friend are making a new 317 pi server. it works we have it online and now i am begging to code it on my computer. the problem however is i can only code it over at his house for some reason. when i come to my house i cant log on it says error connecting to server. and yes i do change the ip to my ip. i do however have the 2nd ip in the client.java as 127.0.0.1 because i do not have any desire to have it online right now. if anyone knows if im forgetting to change something in the client or if i need to change something in the source to get this to work i would greatly appreciate. thanks

Read full topic
